name: Failure is Progress (Soskar)
description:
This game made for Wowie Jam 3.0

Simple puzzle game with 5 levels, where you need to kill your character as much as possible to complete the game.

In this game, you can die from spikes, falling from a height, and being shot.

Controls

A, D — Movement

Space — Jump

hit R — restart level

hold R — reset level

Left Mouse Button — fire (if you have a gun)
